item.title: ‘Slow Horses’ Creator Will Smith Leaving Show After Season 5

item.title: Chris Rock’s “Brilliant” Laugh Factory Set Covered Divorce, ‘Love Island,’ Halle Berry and Yes, the Slap
item.description: The iconic stand-up comedy venue confirmed the appearance as owner Jamie Masada was in attendance to catch Rock’s hourlong set that ended with the audience “roaring and screaming.”
